meanings.definition: To cause to combine with fluorine.
meanings.sent1: I will fluate the metal to make it resistant to corrosion.
meanings.sent2: The scientist will fluate the chemical to enhance its properties.
meanings.sent3: The chef decided to fluate the ingredients to create a unique flavor.
meanings.sent4: She fluated her ideas with creativity to come up with a brilliant solution.
meanings.sent5: The artist fluated colors to produce a stunning painting.

meanings.definition: A compound of fluorine with another element or radical.
meanings.sent1: The laboratory received a new fluate for testing.
meanings.sent2: Fluates are commonly used in industrial processes.
meanings.sent3: The magician's potion contained a mysterious fluate.
meanings.sent4: The treasure map led to a hidden cave filled with valuable fluates.
meanings.sent5: The detective found a clue in the form of a rare fluate.
